questions.question_text: A consortium was established in a collaborative effort to strengthen the cybersecurity posture of multiple organizations within an industry sector. The participating entities decided to adopt a threat intelligence exchange architecture in which all threat data is collected, analyzed, and disseminated through a single central hub. What type of threat intelligence exchange architecture was implemented in this scenario?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
The centralized exchange architecture consists of a central hub that acts as a repository for intelligence that it receives from various participating members and other sources.

questions.question_text:
Miley, an analyst, wants to reduce the amount of collected data and make the storing and sharing process easy. She uses filtering, tagging, and queuing technique to sort out the relevant and structured data from the large amounts of unstructured data.
Which of the following techniques was employed by Miley?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Answer is B
As per Module 04 Page 387 of CTIA Courseware

questions.question_text:
John, a threat intelligence analyst in Cybertech Company, was asked to obtain information that provides greater insight into the current cyber risks. To gather such information, John needs to find the answer of the following questions:

• Why the organization might be attacked?
• How the organization might be attacked?
• Who might be the intruders?

Identity the type of security testing John is going to perform.

comments.content: Before collecting, we need collection requirements. Deter the scope and needs.

discussion.content: collected in order to fulfil production intelligence = D and not C
why C it should be D?

questions.question_text:
Kira works as a security analyst in an organization. She was asked to define and set up the requirements before collecting threat intelligence information. The requirements should focus on what must be collected in order to fulfil production intelligence.

Which of the following categories of threat intelligence requirements should Kira focus on?

choices.B: Intelligence on latest vulnerabilities, threat actors, and their tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs)
choices.C: Intelligence extracted latest attacks analysis on similar organizations, which includes details about latest threats and TTPs
choices.A: Intelligence related to increased attacks targeting a particular software or operating system vulnerability
choices.D: Intelligence that reveals risks related to various strategic business decisions

questions.question_text:
Bob, a threat analyst, works in an organization named TechTop. He was asked to collect intelligence to fulfil the needs and requirements of the Red Tam present within the organization.
Which of the following are the needs of a RedTeam?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Answer is B
As per Module 06 Page 516 of CTIA Courseware
